header.headertext: AMENDMENT TO BE MOVED IN GRAND COMMITTEE

text.quote: 000: After Clause 5, insert the following new Clause—

Any electricity supplier which also retails electricity to either domestic, commercial or industrial users shall, within 2 years of this Act coming into effect, divest itself of its retail business so that—
text.IndentOne: (a) an electricity supplier shall have no financial interest in or exercise any right over a retailer of electricity or gas supplies;
(b) a retailer of electricity or gas shall have no financial interest in or exercise any right over an electricity supplier;
(c) no person may hold a directorship of an electricity supplier and a retailer of electricity or gas concurrently,
any contracts entered into between any of the divesting parties shall cease to have effect when this section comes into effect.
text.quote: Generators which have a direct contract to supply the majority of their output to a defined site through a private transmission scheme are exempt from this section.”
